metadata.title: Disney Kids' W000092 "Cars" Stainless Steel Time Teacher Watch with Leather Band
features: TIME TO TELL TIME BROCHURE- Included with each purchase is an interactive Time Teacher Punch Out Clock, giving kids and parents a fun way to learn how to tell time.
EASY TO READ DIAL- Design with labeled "HOUR" and "MINUTE" dial hands and a minute track to help children learn to tell time.
OFFICIALLY LICENSED DISNEY WATCH- For the Disney Lover, this Officially Licensed Disney Watch features fan favorite beloved characters straight from Disney movies

QUALITY MATERIALS- Our Disney watches are lab tested and made with high-quality stainless steel for casebacks. Cases are plastic to ensure durability during children's play. The case diameter measures 32mm, and the strap size of 16mm.
WATER RESISTANT- Up to 30 meters (100ft), meaning safe to wear in the rain or get splashed. DO NOT recommend wearing it when bathing, swimming, diving, etc.
PERFECT GIFT- Whether for yourself or a Disney Fan, this is the perfect gift to invoke your most favorite character memories. Great for graduation, birthday, holiday, or any special occasion.
description: Keep track of time with this officially licensed Disney stainless steel kid's time teacher watch by ewatchfactory on your wrist. The timepiece displays artwork from your favorite Disney character on the face, and is designed with labeled "hour" and "minute" hands to help young ones learn how to tell time. This classic watch has a polished and matte steel finish and a precision Japanese movement for accurate time keeping and a 1 year manufacturer warranty.

A unique watch company, Ewatchfactory is infinitely driven by the ever-evolving trends in the watch industry to create some of the world's finest timepiece collections. With an array of fabulous styles for men, women, and children, Ewatchfactory has something for every member of the family.Established in 1998 with offices in New York, Paris, Switzerland, Hong Kong and Shenzhen, Ewatchfactory combines today's state-of-the-art technology along with the best design influences worldwide to offer truly inspired watch designs.The Ewatchfactory family of watches offers designs in an array of sizes, styles and materials for adults and children. From luxury to affordability, Ewatchfactory creates a timepiece for every budget, while bringing fashion to function year after year.
